es.uvigo.esei.amchartsjava.core.api.axis

Interface ICategoryAxisController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAxisBaseController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CategoryAxisController

    public interface ICategoryAxisController
extends IAxisBaseController
    Interface for controller of CategoryAxis. Details of CategoryAxis and its properties in AmCharts API
    Author:
    Iago Fernández Cuñarro
